Welcome.About: Graduated in Telecommunications, but I chose to specialize in **Web Development**, using **TypeScript Next.js** for front-end and **Python Django/Flask** for back-end. I have solid experience in **API integration**, **database management**, and creating **interactive visualizations**, with a focus on **optimized and scalable solutions**. Driven by curiosity and always seeking improvement, I thrive on **new challenges** to refine my skills and provide tailored solutions for project needs. My goal is to **develop high-performance, intuitive applications**, while emphasizing effective collaboration within technical and product teams. I have a deep passion for **data structure** and **mathematical thinking**, leveraging them to build efficient systems and deliver impactful results.

Project.Title: My Project
Project.Description: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

Hobies.Description: During and after my university studies, I immersed myself in carrying out various exciting projects while honing my development skills. Each new challenge allowed me to explore and deepen my knowledge, providing me with valuable experience and a growing enthusiasm for technological innovation.
